title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) built with SvelteKit.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, pull, delete, and list models from JVM apps.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, vision, fine-tuning, and more.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate code, refactor, and chat with Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot UI with Ollama backend, file uploads, and conversation sharing.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for interacting with the Ollama API; async and sync clients.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that plugs into any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing using Ollama models.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama LLM and embedding fields with admin widgets.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that chats via Ollama, supports group threads and voice replies.
